title: Nada files to terminate her contract with 'Mafia Records' | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Nada files to terminate her contract with 'Mafia Records' By KpopJoA 2 minutes ago 187 0 0 0 Google+ Gaining popularity for her appearance on Mnet 's 'Unpretty Rapstar 3', Wassup 's Nada appears to have filed for a contract termination with her current agency, 'Mafia Records' , according to reports on January 31.
Nada had received much attention for her rapping skills and being a runner up on 'Unpretty Rapstar 3'. Following this, the singer had the chance to model in advertisements and other opportunities. From Mafia Records' perspective, they hoped a new star would be born. However, Nada seems to have decided to explore other options while taking on various entertainment jobs, Mafia Records expressed their regrets. 
The problem arose when Nada approached the agency, asking for the amount in revenues since her appearance on 'Unpretty Rapstar.' Upon revealing the total number of revenues up to last December, they explained that the actual amount wasn't as large, in addition to training fees. 
Nada did not back down, instead filing to terminate her contract with Mafia Records. Nonetheless, Mafia Records is currently looking for a way to resolve the issue with the singer. Stay tuned for updates. YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
